Package ml.alternet.discover

A service locator implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Injection
    This interface contains qualifiers used in conjunction with a CDI container (JSR 330).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiscoveryService
    A simple service discovery component for retrieving classes.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Injection.LookupKey
    Use this qualifier to inject an instance to lookup with the discovery service.
    Injection.Producer
    Generates a producer for the class or interface that will be used with the lookup key qualifier.
    Injection.Producers
    Allow to repeat a producer annotation.
    LookupKey
    Describe the lookup key for class discovery.
    LookupKeys
    Allow to repeat a lookup key annotation.

Package ml.alternet.discover Description

A service locator implementation. Can be used with or without a CDI (JSR330) container.
See Also:
DiscoveryService
